title: Bobby's Mailbag + Riddle Me This + Amy Needs Advice
itunes:title: Bobby's Mailbag + Riddle Me This + Amy Needs Advice
description:
Bobby reads an email from a listener whose girlfriend still wears one of her ex-boyfriend's shirts to bed at night. Show members compete with each in 'Riddle Me This'. Amy needs advice for a friend who is dog sitting her exes dog.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
